description: Discharge of Schedule 8 Para 1.5 Construction Environmental Management Plan logistics Plan  and a Traffic Management & Logistics Plan as required by planning application 18/AP/0900 for Redevelopment of the site to include the demolition of Capital House 42-46 Weston Street SE1 with the erection of a 39-storey building (3 basement levels and ground with mezzanine and 38 storeys) of a maximum height of 137.9m (AOD) to provide up to 905 student accommodation units (Sui Generis use), flexible retail/caf√©/office floorspace (Class A1/A3/B1), cycle parking, servicing, refuse and plant areas, public realm improvements and other associated works incidental to the development.
